channel.title: Need small bit of help
channel.description:
Im using testscape and im adding NPC's in. I know how to make them drop items and all that stuff but i cant get NPCID2 for the monsters...
It doesnt come up in my listener like everyone said its supposed to...so where do i get it at?[br][size=1]Posted at: July 12, 2006, 07:33:50 PM[/size][hr]hmm...i used cheezscape to get the NPCID but when i entered everything on testscape and killed the monster it didnt drop anything :S i thinks i need a tut..or a good explanation :D

item.title: Need small bit of help
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

Start mopar client, go on the TAB help and click on NPC ID’s and get your IDS there… for Item IDS you got to Item ID’s

Read full topic
